--- create_table_if_not_exists.sql
create table if not exists foo (
  foo int64,
  bar float64 not null,
) primary key (foo, bar)

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen:      93,
  IfNotExists: true,
  Name:        &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 27,
        NameEnd: 30,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 35,
        NameEnd: 38,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 39,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: 64,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 48,
        NameEnd: 51,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 52,
        Name:    "FLOAT64",
      },
      NotNull: true,
      Hidden:  -1,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 85,
        NameEnd: 88,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 90,
        NameEnd: 93,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS foo (
  foo INT64,
  bar FLOAT64 NOT NULL
) PRIMARY KEY (foo, bar)
